message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is special to you, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $15000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think this product is worth more than $15000. Let me know if you're willing to consider this revised offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $16000 for the product.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $17000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering you a deal for $17000. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me in the middle.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $16500 for the product.

I'm getting close to considering other options, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not willing to go below $16800. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price point.
Hello Alice, I've considered your last offer carefully. I would like to propose an offer of $16600 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any further, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I think this product is worth more than $16600. I'm willing to sell it to you for $16800, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. After reviewing the situation, I am willing to offer $16700 for the product.
